```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

Reads in `processed_samples.csv` and creates sample CSV
```{r}
# formatting as dataframe and coercing correct data types
series_matrix <- read.csv("processed_samples.csv", header = F)
names <- series_matrix[, 1] 
samples <- series_matrix  %>% select(-V1) %>% t() %>% as.data.frame() 
colnames(samples) <- names
rownames(samples) <- NULL
samples <- samples 
write.csv(samples, "samples_matrix.csv", row.names = F)
```

```{r}
norm_counts <- read.csv("norm_counts.csv")
gene_info  <- read.csv("gene_info.csv")

head(norm_counts)
head(gene_info)
gene_info <- gene_info %>% select(c(GeneID, Symbol, EnsemblGeneID))
head(gene_info)
joined <- norm_counts %>% left_join(gene_info, join_by("GeneID"))
joined <- joined %>% select(c(Symbol, EnsemblGeneID, GeneID), everything())
head(joined)
write.csv(joined, "norm_counts_joined.csv", row.names = F)

```
